net.hockeyapp.android.views

Class FeedbackMessageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • net.hockeyapp.android.views.FeedbackMessageView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class FeedbackMessageView
extends android.widget.LinearLayout

    Description

    Internal helper class to draw the content view of a Feedback message row
